FuncDef: This command configures the IS-IS interface type as either broadcast or point-to-point.

ParaDef.Info: Configures the interface to maintain this link as a broadcast network.
Configures the interface to maintain this link as a point-to-point link.

ExtraInfo: Default: point-to-point - For IP interfaces on SONET channels.broadcast - For IP interfaces on Ethernet or unknown type physical interfaces.
